subtitle: Home made beefburgers are very easy to make and taste extra special when cooked on the barbecue.

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the onion and garlic. Saute together for 2-3 min or until softened. Remove from heat and leave to cool.
In a bowl, mix together the beef, onion and garlic mixture, seasoning, breadcrumbs and enough egg to bind.
Using lightly floured hands, divide mixture into equal portions and shape into burgers.  Chill for at least 60 min.
Cook on barbecue for 8-10 min, turning over halfway through, until cooked.

title: Barbecued beefburgers
